data.text: Forget searching through the seat back pocket--we have made it easy for you to view our new inflight menu on the Allegiant mobile app. 📱 https://t.co/GsJ9TSJX6e

Look at that beautiful horizon!

📸: dontenphoto https://t.co/wKvifDboAm

Nonstop flights mean spending less time in airports and avoiding crowded hubs. It's the fastest, safest way to get to the people and places that matter most. That's why we're proud that every Allegiant flight is nonstop! #TogetherWeFly

📸: drecomeflywithme https://t.co/8VXTqcYkr1
Skip the ticket counter (and touching extra surfaces) by downloading the Allegiant mobile app. It's your personal portal to your boarding pass, flight updates, and more! https://t.co/1s7BccB5c2

Need a new hobby? Try plane spotting!

📸: providence.spotter https://t.co/lh8AVUWn5l
Need a mask? We've got you covered with our complimentary health and safety kits! https://t.co/m7LZMjqoXR
Happy Fourth from our family to yours! https://t.co/s0xV30z3iR

Be sure to check with the airports you'll be traveling through ahead of time to see what new policies are currently in place to help keep you safe. #KnowBeforeYouGo 📸: @codywanner https://t.co/jpR929AFUZ
Face coverings must cover the nose and mouth at all times, and can only be briefly removed to eat or drink. https://t.co/X6K6Arkxvt
There's something special about watching the sun rise. 🌄✈️ 📸: @em.coffey_ https://t.co/6GkTJW5R9o

You might not hear the sleigh bells jingling just yet, but we're halfway to Christmas! Start planning for the holidays and check out our flight schedule, which is now available through February 9, 2021. https://t.co/tNbDuKCzqg
We protect our passengers and team members by regularly using and long-lasting, advanced protectant that eliminates viruses and bacteria on contact. #TogetherWeFly https://t.co/EHf6dbCB5t

data.text:
A good friend will hang out with you, but a great friend will get on a plane with you! This #TravelTuesday, we want to know if you have a best travel bud! Tweet your favorite travel partner and let them know where you want to go next! 

📸: @fit_happy_dad https://t.co/WG1TEuZs3T

Today is only day of the year our flag flies at half-staff for half the day. Honoring our fallen servicemen and women, it flies at half-staff until noon, and then we raise it all the way up to fly until sunset. 

May we mourn the sacrifices of the fallen and honor their legacy. https://t.co/nlGzGMTh2N

The actions we each take today will shape our future. That's why we are "Going the Distance for Health and Safety." Together, let's take these steps now so we can enjoy many more special moments in special places! https://t.co/ksRdAJCHyl
We talk a lot about how we clean the inside of our planes, but did you know it would take one person 30 hours to clean the outside? Teamwork makes the dream work! https://t.co/jZlDBgyb5I

data.text:
There's something special about walking across the stage at graduation--honoring the past as you move toward the future. But even without a ceremony, we hope this year's graduates still make their walk in their own way! 

Congrats to the Class of 2020! We are so proud of you! https://t.co/cOUG6LxgOX

data.text: Did someone say PIZZA?? Allegiant team members from Ft. Lauderdale and Sarasota made sure no one went hungry at several Florida hospitals as they delivered nearly 250 pizzas and hundreds of granola bars and sweet treats to hungry staff members! Thanks for sharing the love! ❤️☀️ https://t.co/T8sBrudJtF

Hey there @SaltLifeRyan ! We've made it easier for you to change/cancel your itinerary with no penalties by visiting https://t.co/MeUg2GKFhX. If you should need further assistance send us a direct message and we would be happy to help you. - Charles

We know flexibility is key as you plan your next trip. That's why we extended our no-fee change and cancellation policy to cover all trips purchased through June 30, 2020. So sit back, relax and know that you can change your plans if you need to!

📸: dallasrm https://t.co/qKd6y24j5M

We missed seeing these kiddos face-to-face, but that didn't stop us from enjoying some quality face time with the next generation of brilliant engineers from @natemackrobotic! We loved hearing about what they've been up to and getting to talk shop! #STEMProud https://t.co/089DpLri6v

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text:
When you take to the skies, know those on board have confirmed they're healthy. During digital check-in, passengers must complete a health acknowledgement saying they won't travel with a fever and no one in their household has shown symptoms of COVID-19. 

📸: @plane_spotter_dude https://t.co/E6ntoInjAa

Get ready, because we've extended our schedule through Dec. 15, 2020! There are no change or cancellation fees for trips purchased on or before June 30, 2020, so start planning your trip today! https://t.co/Qe9yQZQloK
We commend those who answer the call of duty and dedicate themselves to keeping our friends and neighbors safe and healthy! https://t.co/77OHFfQ22V

data.text:
Ready for a change of scenery? We are, too, so show us a photo of the most beautiful place you've ever visited using #togetherwefly! Let's see those sunny skies, sandy beaches or snow-covered mountains if that's more your thing! ☀ 🌊⛰️ #TravelTuesday

📸: @irwin.nick https://t.co/G7oYHOqs8s
We make these gloves look good! 😎 https://t.co/2NPyEGemnY

Many homeless shelters are closed right now, so two of our team members--Melissa and Daniel--began making a dozen sack lunches per day to give to homeless members of their community. They've made more than 200 deliveries so far and spread some extra sunshine in Ft. Lauderdale! 👍 https://t.co/wkOJu6g8qu

data.text: Officially counting down the days until we welcome the NFL to @AllegiantStadm! https://t.co/TtZpVVzdBp
We are proud to be No. 1 in the Airline Quality Rating's long-running annual ranking of major U.S. airlines! See the full study here: https://t.co/jUp4FJCLof.

domain.description: A taxonomy of user interests.

data.text: Sometimes we forget that nurses are people, too. They feel tired. They get sad and scared, just like we do. But that's what makes them special. They tuck all of that away and put their patients first every day. Let us never take for granted their sacrifice. #ThankYouNurses https://t.co/N12WhLlqKP

We've begun providing complimentary personal health and safety kits to our customers. As supplies are delivered over the next couple of weeks, we will have them available for each and every customer. Kits include a single-use face mask, disposable gloves and two sanitizing wipes. https://t.co/VfTlppgMFi

The world of travel feels different this year, but there are always more memories to be made, more lands to explore and more things to discover when the time is right. May we be grateful for that today and always.

Happy National Travel & Tourism Week! 

 📸: @codywanner https://t.co/dKpTvK6bdo

Neighbors helping neighbors is what our communities are built on. That's why we're proud to support the Vegas Community Pantry, which is run from the garages of three Las Vegas locals. So far, the Vegas Community Pantry has helped about 500 locals get the support they need. https://t.co/ETBSurkQLC

Congratulations to Make-A-Wish on 40 years of wishes! Sharing our HQ campus with the local chapter gives us a front row seat to their amazing ability to bring communities together. "Where there's a wish, there's a way." We look forward to helping grant many more. #WorldWishDay https://t.co/wUS7lomrvS

data.text:
Social distancing isn't just for when your feet are on the ground. We're giving you some extra space in the air, too! Whenever possible, our crew members will reseat customers to provide additional distancing onboard our planes. 

📸: @queencityspotter https://t.co/NmrRzDv3is

We are grateful to those who show up each day to protect us and make our communities strong. Thank you for your long hours, sleepless nights and the many personal sacrifices you make in service of others. https://t.co/8qJRO9HwVG

Ever wondered how fresh the air inside a plane is? On average, the air is changed every three minutes! The air in our cabin is a mix of fresh air and VOC (volatile organic compound)-filtered air. VOC filters have the same benefits as HEPA filters, plus additional filtration. https://t.co/LOgXxFRuVN

data.text:
Hospital workers in Phoenix are eating well thanks a special Allegiant team member named Rebecca who has been coordinating food deliveries to hospitals all over the area! 

"We can choose panic or we can choose purpose," said Rebecca. "I hope we all choose purpose." https://t.co/QZ55QhGcHL

data.text:
The Draft has always been about looking toward the future. This year, teams welcome new players. Vegas embraces a new team. Fans celebrate the season ahead. It's a chance for all of us to get excited for what's to come. 

We sure are. 

📷: Chase Stevens/ Las Vegas Review-Journal https://t.co/B9HKhB1s66

Our flights are now BYOM—bring your own magazine. We have removed all inflight magazines to reduce shared items among our passengers. But look on the bright side—even if your phone dies and you forgot your book, you’ll always have this beautiful view. 

📸: @mattharpt27 https://t.co/fLADTiorYD

data.text: With cabin fever setting in, we want to see your cabin photos! This #TravelTuesday, show us your favorite pictures snapped on board or in the sky! https://t.co/gP6gAEzPbT

Our presence in the communities we serve means more than just flights. It means connecting our customers with loved ones. It means jobs and tourism, which provide a vital economic boost. Because of that, we are as committed to local recovery as we are to serving our customers. https://t.co/DfZ0pMehH3

data.text: We have always served all of our inflight refreshments—both food and beverages—in pre-packaged, factory-sealed containers. That means the only person to touch your snack is you. Low-touch service has major benefits! https://t.co/Hkuwln8oEF
Adhering to hospital-grade standards, we routinely treat our planes with an advanced antimicrobial protectant that kills viruses, germs and bacteria on contact for 14 days. https://t.co/uwbMI9cOMp

Hospital workers are getting some extra supplies thanks to a team of our Asheville-based flight attendants who made nearly 175 face masks. So far, the masks have been donated to four hospitals and will be used to protect frontline healthcare workers. Way to spread the sunshine! https://t.co/z7DbIwaayS
We are proud that several of our charters have helped transport medical personnel and supplies to the communities that need them most. https://t.co/eF0fOrPgYx
“Together We Fly” is more than a hashtag, it’s our promise to you. That’s why Allegiant is making changes that continue to put your health and safety first. https://t.co/Z31Ty1tF7w
We are here for you rain 🌧️ or shine ☀️and we are always happy to help. https://t.co/0thRxvW9eB
Hi @Paulina_deale, please send us a DM with your confirmation number and email address and we can get you taken care of as soon as possible. Thank you for your patience. - CNS
Hi @SammyAdebiyi please send us a DM with your confirmation number, email and request and we will work to take care of you as soon as possible. Thank you for your patience. - CNS

Hi @willwinter12if you've sent us a PM with your travel info, then you're all set and no further action is needed. It may take us at least a week to get back to you as we’re currently prioritizing responses based on departure date, but we'll backdate and honor your request. - CNS

Hi @itzelgrci, sorry for the delay, we are inundated with requests. Please DM us with your confirmation number and email address and we'll happily assist you as soon as possible. Thank you for your patience. - CNS

Hi @ChrisLAtkinson if you've sent us a PM with your email and confirmation number, then you're all set and no further action is needed. We are working to take care of your request as soon as possible. Thanks for your patience. - CNS
Hi @mollympls11, sorry for the inconvenience. Please DM us with your confirmation number, email address and request and we will work on getting you taken care of as soon as possible.

Be aware that Allegiant does not use third parties or travel agencies to process changes or cancellations to existing itineraries. An Allegiant team member will not request credit card information when making these adjustments.

Hi @sunlover46 if you've sent us a PM with your email and confirmation number, then you're all set and no further action is needed. It may take us at the very least a week to get back to you, but rest assured we'll backdate and honor your request. - CNS

data.text: Here is a tutorial for passengers who want to cancel their entire itinerary. If your reservations were purchased with a hotel, car, voucher, or promo code, you will still need to reach back out to us so that our team can assist you. https://t.co/cMMUSxPNLt
If you are looking to cancel your entire trip, please do so by clicking "Cancel My Entire Trip" under the "Customize Your Trip" category.
https://t.co/SF9PEzb7D3

Hi @debsouthdakota Thank you so much for your patience. We are responding to messages in order of departure date. Please rest assured that we will honor your cancellation request even if we aren't able to connect before your original travel date. - SM

Hi @SteveTackett Thank you so much for your patience. We are responding to DMs by order of departure date, so it may take some time to get back to you. Please rest assured that we will get you taken care of. - SM

Hi @BrandonRector4 We're so sorry for the delayed response. Please rest assured that even if we cannot connect before your scheduled departure time we will still honor the cancellation request you sent to our messages. Thank you so much for your patience. - SM

Hi @Wkarlarm We are currently responding to DMs by order of departure date. While it may take some time to connect please rest assured that we will honor the cancellation request you included in your DM. Thank you for your patience. - SM

Hi @eathorpe we are currently responding to messages in order of departure date. While it may take some time to connect, please rest assured that we will help get you taken care of. As long as your DM includes your change/cancellation request we will honor the current policy. -SM

Hi @devinbgoble We'd love to help make sure you receive the full value of your reservation. If you'd like to send us a DM with your confirmation number, email address, and travel dates we will get you taken care of. - SM

Hi @ColtsFan0129 we're so sorry you've had trouble connecting with our team. If you'd like us to assist through this channel please send us a DM with your confirmation number, email address, and travel dates. - SM

Hi @Mtzbevo Thank you so much for your patience. We are responding to messages in order of travel date, so while it may take a few days to connect, please rest assured we will honor the change request you sent to our DM. - SM

Hi @ohermadi we're so sorry for the troubles you've had connecting with our team. If you'd like us to assist through this channel please feel free to send us a DM with your confirmation number, email address, and travel dates and we'd be happy to get you taken care of. - SM

data.text: Hi @Terry16276 At this time the only way to receive the full value of your reservation is through our call center, live chat, or social media. If you'd like us to assist you through Twitter please send us a DM with your confirmation number, email address, and travel dates. - SM
